autonomy.question: Did I attribute my successes and accomplishments solely to my own abilities, forgetting to acknowledge God's hand in guiding me?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control when using your words to hurt or offend others?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and speak to others using words that dishonored their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: on recreational activities to the detriment of my financial obligations and
to the detriment of my financial obligations and
prodigality.question: Have I spent excessively on recreational activities to the detriment of my financial obligations and family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: over my financial responsibilities and family needs
prodigality.question: Have I used excessive and wasteful online betting habits to take precedence over my financial responsibilities and family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in excessive and wasteful gambling over my financial responsibilities
prodigality.question: Have I recklessly prioritized indulging in excessive and wasteful gambling over my financial responsibilities, potentially harming those who depend on me?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: through conversations at social events or online forums
at social events or online forums
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true, through conversations at social events or online forums?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: about others ' faults or private affairs
gossip.question: Have I spoken about others' faults or private affairs for my own enjoyment, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in spreading rumors about friends ' private lives
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in spreading rumors about friends' private lives, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impurity.question: Did you use practices, substances, or objects to prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.

impurity.question: Have you used certain practices, substances, or objects to prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.

impurity.question: Did I use substances to prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.
